title: Chapter 2231 - Chapter 2231: The Despair Of The Galaxy
body:
Chapter 2231 - Chapter 2231: The Despair Of The Galaxy

Chapter 2231: The despair of the Galaxy

Translator: 549690339

They were well aware of the strange young man’s combat strength. He was a very good heaven’s pride expert in the heaven realm. His combat strength was far above Luo cangqiong’s, and he was not much weaker than the star River.

But now, he was killed by Lu Ming in one move.

Wasn’t lu Ming’s combat strength even stronger than the current Galaxy?

Didn’t lu Ming have a crippled body? if he could not become a Martial Emperor, how could his combat strength increase so quickly?

They couldn’t figure it out. All they could think of now was to run.

The star River and Luo cangqiong retreated at almost the same time.

“Seeing that you can’t win, you want to run, have you asked me? He he he!”

Lu Ming sneered. He took a step forward and caught up with Luo cangqiong in an instant like a ray of light.

Luo cangqiong’s eyes were filled with fear.

The unfamiliar young man’s combat strength was above his, but he was killed by Lu Ming in one move. If Lu Ming wanted to kill him, he would not need a second move.

“Lu Ming, you can’t kill me. If you kill me, my grandfather will never let you off!”

Luo cangqiong roared.

“Your grandfather? He already attacked me in the primordial realm.

Unfortunately, he’s seriously injured now, and 1 don’t know where he’s gone to recuperate. I’ll personally take his head one day!”

Lu Ming sneered.

He had to kill Luo cangqiong.

Back then, it was because of Luo cangqiong that Qiu Yue had fallen into a desperate situation and almost couldn’t wake up.

Later on, Luo cangqiong’s grandfather, Emperor tianluo, met up with the Emperor of the MU family and went to the ancient Moon sanctuary to kill him.

It could be said that he, the Daluo heaven sect, and the Luo family had long been mortal enemies.

Even if Luo cangqiong didn’t come to him, he would go to him.

Since he had met him today, he would not let him go.

“Impossible!”

Upon hearing Lu Ming’s words, Luo cangqiong roared in disbelief.

“Have a safe trip!”

Lu Ming spoke indifferently and pointed his finger.

Pfft!

Without any suspense, Luo cangqiong’s glabella was pierced through by the finger force. His soul was destroyed and he died on the spot.

At this point, the two King physiques of the Daluo heaven sect had been killed by Lu Ming.

After killing Luo cangqiong, Lu Ming chased after him in the star River.

At this moment, the Galaxy used all its strength and flew at high speed.

He had a feeling that if he did not leave today, he would not be able to leave.

Lu Ming’s combat strength had exceeded his imagination.

However, he still had hope.

Lu Ming had a crippled body and could never become a Martial Emperor. Even if he could improve his combat strength, there was a limit.

He, on the other hand, could continue to improve. He did not believe that he would not be able to kill Lu Ming after he broke through to the true Emperor realm.

As long as he was alive, he would be able to kill Lu Ming.

So he used all his strength to run for his life, but when he looked back, he was scared out of his wits.

It was because Lu Ming was not far away from him.

“Heng Xing River, go down and accompany Luo cangqiong, so that he won’t be lonely!”

Lu Ming said coldly.

He displayed his six-feathered divine wings, and his speed was extremely shocking. With a flap of his transparent wings, he approached the eternal Star River.

“Kill!”

The Galaxy stopped and shouted. An eternal God clock appeared and vibrated.

Now, the cultivation base of the Galaxy was much stronger than before. It had reached the three-star void Emperor realm, the second realm of the eternal law, and it had also mastered a King path law.

Hence, the power of the eternal God Bell was many times stronger than it had been in the past.

Layers of sound waves rushed out and turned into sharp swords, slashing at Lu Ming. It was extremely terrifying.

“This move again. Star River, this move is useless Against Me!”

Lu Ming spoke indifferently and struck out with his palm.

BOOM!

The void exploded, and the terrifying palm force rushed toward the star River like a mountain.

The sharp swords formed by the sound waves of the eternal God Bell exploded and collapsed one after another.

The power of the palm did not stop. It surged towards the stellar River and bombarded the eternal God Bell.

Thump!

The eternal God Bell trembled violently and cracks appeared on it. Xinghe’s body was sent flying like a cannonball and he coughed up blood in the air. “How is that possible?”

The Galaxy roared in disbelief.

How could Lu Ming’s combat strength be so strong?

In the five years he had been in the heaven realm, the eternal Star River had obtained a large amount of resources. There were even some great figures who valued him and took him in as a disciple. He was a heavenly Emperor. After being a disciple of the heavenly Emperor and being nurtured by the heavenly Emperor, he had made great progress in all aspects.

His combat strength had also soared. But even so, after five years, he was even more vulnerable when he met Lu Ming again.

He found it hard to accept!

these people are so weak. They came to kill Lu Ming?”

Dandan pursed her lips, feeling speechless.

“Eh, he’s completely courting death!”

Gu yingzhong was also speechless.

Meanwhile, the surrounding onlookers were also in a heated discussion.

“Who is that person? What powerful combat strength!”

I heard them talking about a peerless cripple. What’s that about?”

“I don’t know!”

1 know. I heard that the primordial realm produced a peerless cripple who has yet to become a sovereign, but he has already mastered many nomological laws, even two of the strongest nomological laws!

“What? He can control two types of ultimate laws?”

The scene was in an uproar. Many people exclaimed, but even more people didn’t believe it.

They didn’t believe that anyone could master two ultimate maxims. It was impossible. No one had ever done it in history.

In the sky, Lu Ming did not stop and continued to charge toward the Galaxy.

Casting the six-feathered divine wings, Lu Ming’s speed was extremely fast. With a flash of his wings, he crossed the void and caught up with the eternal Star River in an instant.

Thump!

Lu Ming struck out with his palm again and it hit the eternal God Bell in the Galaxy.

This time, the eternal God clock that covered Xinghe’s body exploded. Xinghe’s body emitted the sound of bones breaking. His body was sent flying and he spat out a large mouthful of blood.

Lu Ming had not used his full strength. His palm only contained four types of laws.

Chaos law, devour law, penetration law, and extreme law.

In the past few years, Lu Ming had improved too much.

After refining a trace of energy from the ancestral dragon blood, his physical strength had increased greatly.

At the same time, the law of alchemy, the law of craftsmanship, and the law of penetration were perfected one after another. Lu Ming’s body and Saint energy had improved a lot after tempering his body and Saint energy.

The strength of the Galaxy was not weaker than LAN Yun and Yan Xi, whom Lu Ming had encountered three years ago.

At that time, Lu Ming would need to use all his strength to fight against experts like LAN Yun or Yan Xi.

But now, Lu Ming had also used four types of laws. He had not even used his ultimate move and he could already achieve a crushing defeat. He could completely crush them.

“Let’s go!”

Lu Ming chased after the Galaxy.

The stellar River erupted in a frenzy as it tried its best to escape.

“Lu Ming, you can’t kill me! My master is the celestial Thearch …”

At the same time, Xing Chen roared and brought up his master, hoping that Lu Ming would have some reservations.

However, he knew very well that Lu Ming was a lawless person. He could not be intimidated.

As expected, Lu Ming was unmoved and continued to chase after him.

The eternal Star River revealed a look of despair.

“Lu Ming, stop!”

At this moment, a furious roar was heard. Then, a terrifying fist force blasted toward Lu Ming from the sky..
